column1: '''The Lord of the Rings''' is a pinball machine by [[wikipedia:Stern (gaming company)
column2: Stern Pinball]]. It is licensed merchandise of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column3: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], released in [[2003]]. The creation process of the machine was documented in ''[[wikipedia:How It's Made

column2: multiballs]], named after the three films:

column1: ;''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
*Collect all members of the [[Fellowship of the Ring
column2: Fellowship]] and shoot [[Barad-dûr]] to start. Defeat the cave troll and the [[Durin's Bane

column1: ;''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
*Spell "K-E-E-P" and lock three balls to start. Hit all jackpots to complete.
;''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
*Collect 5000 souls on the "Path of the Dead" and shoot [[Orthanc]], Barad-Dûr or Gollum Cave to start. Score all jackpots to complete.
Completing all lights the bonus mode "There and Back Again".
* ''[http://www.ipdb.org/machine.cgi?id=4858 The Lord of the Rings]'' at [http://www.ipdb.org/ IPDB.org]
